footer.desc_main: Outsourcing with intelligence, delivering high performance for your business.
footer.desc_detail: Our solutions in Accounting, Tax, Financial, Payroll, Technology, Paralegal and Special Services are designed to deliver a first-class experience for medium and large companies.
footer.politica_lavagem: Money Laundering Prevention and Combating Policy

home.hero_title: Your accounting has finally become a competitive advantage.
home.hero_sub: We integrate service governance, cutting-edge technology and senior expertise to transform your backoffice into a growth engine. No more bureaucracy, hello performance.
home.pilares_title: The 4 Pillars of BPO INNOVA Excellence
home.governanca_desc: We develop a unique governance process that not only manages but continuously optimizes your services. The result? Predictability, control and a level of satisfaction that transforms clients into partners.
home.tecnologia_desc: Our expertise in MXM ERP, combined with exclusive automation robots, eliminates manual tasks and accelerates your operations. We integrate our system or enhance yours, ensuring agility and reliable data.
home.expertise_desc: Our founders and managers bring over 30 years of experience in leadership positions. You don't talk to a junior, you talk to someone who understands your business and offers strategic insights, not just numbers.
home.estrutura_desc: We combine the flexibility and direct service of a lean structure with the power of our global GGI network. Quick responses to local challenges and robust support for international expansion.
home.servicos_sub: Strategy, processes and automation to accelerate results.
home.contabil_desc: We work in the accounting area to meet all accounting standards and obligations, presenting reports that help management in decision-making.
home.fiscal_desc: We ensure that your company has the best tax performance, monitoring fair alternatives that allow taking advantage of benefits that the law may guarantee.
home.financeiro_desc: We improve the financial management of our clients and clearly present the information necessary for optimizing resource and investment management.
home.folha_desc: Payroll processing and differentiated advisory service, in compliance with e-Social and other obligations.
home.tecnologia_desc: We use cutting-edge ERP or client ERP, complementary tools and artificial intelligence so that our clients have information with reliability and accuracy.
home.paralegal_desc: Our paralegal services solve bureaucratic processes with mastery, speed and precision, so that your company is always in accordance with what is required.
home.servicos_especiais_desc: Our special services are for specific needs that require high-level specialists to solve the needs.
home.cta_title: Ready to transform your business efficiency?
home.cta_desc: Combine optimized processes and cutting-edge technology to grow with confidence. Our team prepares a proposal tailored to your reality.

sobre.hero_title: The Intelligence and Experience that Redefine Accounting
sobre.hero_sub: Our team of accounting and technology experts offers tailored solutions for each unique challenge, ensuring total compliance and optimized processes for your business to thrive.
sobre.frase_destaque: We were born from the union between the robustness of large corporations and the agility of a strategic partner dedicated to your success. We are not just an accounting firm; we are the evolution of backoffice management.
sobre.origem_subtitulo: THE GAP IN THE ACCOUNTING MARKET
sobre.historia_texto1: After more than 30 years in leadership positions and as partners in industry giants, our founders identified a critical gap in the market: on one side, large BPO corporations, often bureaucratic, impersonal and slow; on the other, smaller offices, with close service, but without the flexible technological structure and service governance necessary to support growing companies.
sobre.historia_texto2: BPO INNOVA was founded to fill exactly this space. We created a model that delivers the best of both worlds: the excellence, best practices and security of the world's largest, with the flexibility, agility and personalized service that only a true partner can offer.
sobre.experiencia_subtitulo: Leadership that Understands Business, Not Just Accounting
sobre.experiencia_desc: Our leadership not only understands accounting; they understand business. Vast executive experience allows us to anticipate challenges, offer strategic insights and speak the same language as CFOs, Founders and Executive Boards.
sobre.experiencia_item1: More than 30 years of experience in leadership positions
sobre.experiencia_item2: Strategic vision to anticipate market challenges
sobre.experiencia_item3: Direct communication with CFOs and Executive Boards
sobre.tecnologia_desc_sobre: We have a robust technological ecosystem, led by MXM ERP, which ensures control, accuracy and total integration. Our technology is not an accessory, it is the engine of our efficiency.
sobre.tecnologia_item1: MXM ERP leader in integration and total control
sobre.tecnologia_item4: Technology as the engine of operational efficiency
sobre.governanca_desc_sobre: This is the heart of our operation. We apply a rigorous governance process that optimizes operations, increases satisfaction and transforms accounting data into management intelligence for your business.
sobre.governanca_item1: Rigorous continuous PLAN, ACT, CHECK process
sobre.governanca_item3: Transformation of data into management intelligence
sobre.missao_texto: Ensure that partners and clients are served with excellence, transparency and the most sophisticated solutions for managing their businesses and their human capital.
sobre.visao_texto: To be the best BPO Accounting company in Brazil for our clients and recognized as the premium reference accounting firm, innovating in services and with high use of technology.
sobre.valores_texto: Constantly seek excellence through best governance practices, use of technological innovations and a partnership of trust so that our clients achieve their objectives.
sobre.posicionamento_texto: For companies seeking a strategic and modern accounting partner, we offer a premium service that goes beyond the conventional, transforming data into decisions and driving growth intelligently and sustainably.
sobre.expertise_global_subtitulo: Global Network of Experts in More than 126 Countries
sobre.expertise_global_desc: As a member of Geneva Group International (GGI), one of the largest global alliances of independent audit, accounting and consulting firms, we offer our clients access to a network of experts in more than 126 countries. This ensures high-quality support for their international operations and expansion plans.
sobre.expertise_global_item2: Network of experts in more than 126 countries
sobre.case_sucesso_desc: Now that you know our history and our philosophy, how about we talk about how we can apply them to boost your business?

contato.hero_title: Let's Talk About the Future of Your Business?
contato.hero_sub: We integrate service governance, cutting-edge technology and senior expertise to transform your backoffice into a growth engine. No more bureaucracy, hello performance.
contato.titulo_principal: Our team of experts is ready to understand your challenges and design the ideal solution for your company.
contato.subtitulo: Fill out the form or choose one of the channels below.
contato.entre_contato_desc: We are ready to serve you through our contact channels.

servicos.hero_title: Services Designed for Performance and Governance
servicos.hero_sub: More than outsourcing. A strategic partnership that transforms your backoffice into a growth engine, with the flexibility your business requires
servicos.texto_intro: We understand that each company is unique. That's why our services are modular and fully integrable. You choose which processes to outsource and which to keep internally, operating on our robust ERP or your own system. The result is a tailored operational model, designed for maximum efficiency and scalability.
servicos.explore_titulo: Explore how our Solutions will take your Company to another Level of Excellence

bpo.hero_sub: We take on the management of critical processes with a unique service governance methodology, cutting-edge technology and a team of specialists, allowing you to focus on what really matters: the growth of your business.
bpo.contabil_fiscal_titulo: Accounting and Tax BPO as a Strategic Tool
bpo.contabil_fiscal_desc: We transform accounting from an obligation into a source of valuable insights. We ensure total compliance and generate accurate reports that provide clarity for C-level and Board decision-making. We navigate the complexity of the Brazilian tax system to mitigate risks and optimize your tax burden.
bpo.contabil_fiscal_item1: Difficulty generating reliable financial statements on time.
bpo.contabil_fiscal_item2: High cost and low performance with current accounting (internal or external).
bpo.contabil_fiscal_item3: Loss of strategic or operational professionals from the internal team to the market.
bpo.contabil_fiscal_item4: Insecurity and risks in the face of the complexity of tax obligations.
bpo.financeiro_titulo: Financial BPO with Full Visibility and Control of Your Cash Flow
bpo.financeiro_desc: We manage your accounts payable and receivable with precision and efficiency. Our financial management ensures payments are made on time, receivables are closely monitored, and you have a clear, real-time view of your company's financial health.
bpo.financeiro_item1: To avoid the risk of fines for late payments.
bpo.financeiro_item2: An effective tool to control delinquency.
bpo.financeiro_item3: To free the internal team from the operational effort of accounts receivable and payable.
bpo.financeiro_item4: To focus the internal team on billing and collection.
bpo.folha_titulo: Payroll BPO with Precision, Compliance and Care for Your Human Capital
bpo.folha_desc: We take care of the entire payroll cycle, from hiring to termination. We guarantee absolute precision in calculations, full compliance with labor legislation and the peace of mind that your employees will be paid correctly and on time, strengthening team trust and satisfaction.
bpo.folha_item1: Have a high volume of employees and complex payroll processes.
bpo.folha_item2: Suffer from the loss of strategic professionals in the HR/Payroll area.
bpo.folha_item3: Need to ensure 100% compliance with eSocial and other obligations.

paralegal.hero_title: Strategic Paralegal From Structuring to Total Compliance
paralegal.hero_sub: Navigating Brazilian bureaucracy doesn't have to be an obstacle for your business. Our team of paralegal specialists takes care of all stages of your company's life cycle with agility and precision, ensuring that your corporate structure is always secure, regularized and ready for growth. Leave the complexity with us and focus on your strategy.
paralegal.abertura_desc: We structure the birth of your company correctly from day one. We take care of the entire registration process, from drafting the articles of incorporation to registration with the competent bodies, ensuring a solid foundation, in full compliance and ready to operate without future surprises.
paralegal.abertura_item1: Need complete guidance for company formation
paralegal.abertura_item2: Want to choose the best tax regime from the start
paralegal.abertura_item3: Want to avoid future problems with documentation
paralegal.abertura_item4: Seek agility in the incorporation process
paralegal.encerramento_subtitulo: Close Cycles Safely and Without Pending Issues
paralegal.encerramento_desc: Finalizing an operation is as critical a process as starting it. We conduct the closure of your company meticulously, ensuring all obligations are met and no tax or legal liabilities or pending issues remain. Close this chapter with complete peace of mind.
paralegal.encerramento_item2: Want to avoid future problems with regulatory bodies
paralegal.encerramento_item3: Want to settle all tax and labor obligations
paralegal.encerramento_item4: Seek peace of mind in the closure process
paralegal.alvara_subtitulo: Agility for Your Operation to Start
paralegal.alvara_desc: Time is crucial for business. We take care of obtaining and renewing all necessary licenses and permits so your company can operate legally and without interruptions. We remove bureaucratic obstacles so you can bill as quickly as possible.
paralegal.alvara_item1: Need licenses to start their activities
paralegal.alvara_item2: Want to avoid fines for lack of licenses
paralegal.alvara_item3: Want agility in the licensing process
paralegal.alteracoes_subtitulo: Your Legal Structure Following Business Evolution
paralegal.alteracoes_desc: Has your company evolved? The legal structure needs to keep up. We efficiently manage all contractual changes - whether entry or exit of partners, address change, change in share capital or corporate purpose. We keep your corporate documents always aligned with your business reality.
paralegal.alteracoes_item1: Had entry or exit of partners
paralegal.alteracoes_item3: Changed share capital or corporate purpose
paralegal.alteracoes_item4: Need to keep documents always updated
paralegal.registro_desc: We ensure that your company is properly registered and regularized in all necessary instances: Federal (Federal Revenue), State (State Treasury) and Municipal (City Hall). Proactive management that shields your operation against fines and sanctions.
paralegal.registro_item1: Need to register with government bodies
paralegal.registro_item2: Want to avoid fines for lack of registration

tecnologia.hero_title: Cutting-Edge Technology Accelerating Your Growth with Intelligence and Control
tecnologia.hero_sub: In a market that demands agility, technology cannot be a bottleneck. Our technological architecture is one of the pillars of your performance. We offer a robust, secure and integrated ecosystem, designed to eliminate friction, automate processes and transform data into strategic decisions. Whether using our cutting-edge platform or optimizing yours, we guarantee the infrastructure your business needs to scale without limits.
tecnologia.erp_titulo: High Performance ERP at Your Disposal
tecnologia.erp_desc: We offer access to our MXM ERP, a complete and robust platform, hosted in a first-class cloud environment. This translates to enterprise-level security, Oracle database, automatic backups and a disaster recovery plan. You get the power of cutting-edge technology without the high cost of acquiring and maintaining infrastructure.
tecnologia.erp_diferencial_texto: Our exclusive expertise in MXM, combined with internally developed automation robots, guarantees productivity and efficiency you won't find anywhere else.
tecnologia.erp_item1: First-class cloud infrastructure with enterprise security
tecnologia.erp_item2: Oracle database with automatic backups and disaster recovery
tecnologia.erp_item3: Internally developed automation robots for maximum efficiency
tecnologia.erp_item4: No infrastructure acquisition and maintenance costs
tecnologia.flexibilidade_titulo: Total Flexibility to Enhance Your Environment
tecnologia.flexibilidade_desc: If your company already has a consolidated ERP system, our team integrates perfectly with your environment. We bring our best governance practices, our integration methodology and our automation expertise into your operation, optimizing your processes and maximizing the return on your existing technology investment.
tecnologia.flexibilidade_item1: Perfect integration with your existing ERP without interruptions
tecnologia.flexibilidade_item2: Implementation of best governance practices and methodologies
tecnologia.flexibilidade_item3: Intelligent automation to optimize existing processes
tecnologia.flexibilidade_item4: Maximization of ROI on your current technology investment
tecnologia.fluxo_desc: Simplify the sending and management of tax and accounting documents. Our digital platform centralizes the flow of information securely and organized, eliminating the need for email exchanges and paper. Have total traceability, security and quick access to everything your team needs to operate with agility.
tecnologia.fluxo_item1: Secure and organized centralization of all information
tecnologia.fluxo_item2: Total traceability of documents and processes
tecnologia.fluxo_item3: Quick and efficient access for the entire team
tecnologia.fluxo_item4: Complete elimination of paper and disorganized emails

servicos_especiais.hero_title: Special and Strategic Services for Decisive Moments
servicos_especiais.hero_sub: There are moments in a company's journey when standard expertise is not enough. For these situations of high complexity, critical transitions or strategic demands, we offer a portfolio of consulting services. We access our deepest technical and market knowledge to deliver the clarity and security you need to make the best decisions.
servicos_especiais.representacao_socio_subtitulo: Your Safe and Strategic Presence in Brazil
servicos_especiais.representacao_socio_desc: We act as the legal representative of the foreign partner before Brazilian bodies. We guarantee total compliance, agility in processes and the peace of mind of having a trusted partner taking care of your company before your interests in the country, allowing you to focus on business management and expansion.
servicos_especiais.representacao_socio_item2: Want total compliance with Brazilian bodies
servicos_especiais.representacao_socio_item4: Seek focus on business management and expansion
servicos_especiais.representacao_legal_subtitulo: Protection and Agility for Your Corporate Obligations
servicos_especiais.representacao_legal_desc: We act as your legal representative, an essential figure for companies with non-resident partners or to simplify daily administration. We take care of signatures and legal responsibilities, ensuring your company operates smoothly and in full compliance with Brazilian legislation.
servicos_especiais.representacao_legal_item3: Need agility in signatures and documents
servicos_especiais.representacao_legal_item4: Seek total compliance with Brazilian legislation
servicos_especiais.endereco_fiscal_subtitulo: A Professional Image with the Flexibility You Need
servicos_especiais.endereco_fiscal_desc: We offer a tax address for your company, an intelligent solution that reduces costs with physical infrastructure and transmits immediate credibility to the market. Ideal for startups, foreign companies and businesses that operate in a remote model.
servicos_especiais.endereco_fiscal_item2: Want to reduce costs with physical infrastructure
servicos_especiais.endereco_fiscal_item3: Want to transmit immediate credibility to the market
servicos_especiais.endereco_fiscal_item4: Operate in a remote model or are startups
servicos_especiais.abertura_conta_subtitulo: Agility to Operate: From Bureaucracy to Action
servicos_especiais.abertura_conta_desc: We transform the often slow and bureaucratic process of opening corporate bank accounts into an agile step. We use our relationships and expertise to accelerate approvals and ensure your company is ready to transact as quickly as possible.
servicos_especiais.abertura_conta_item1: Need a corporate bank account quickly
servicos_especiais.abertura_conta_item2: Want to avoid traditional bank bureaucracy
servicos_especiais.abertura_conta_item4: Seek to be ready to transact quickly
servicos_especiais.preparacao_demonstracoes_titulo: Preparation of Financial Statements for Audit
servicos_especiais.preparacao_demonstracoes_desc: We meticulously prepare and organize your financial statements before the auditors arrive. Our work ensures that data is clear, reconciled and in compliance, resulting in a faster, more efficient audit process without unpleasant surprises.
servicos_especiais.preparacao_demonstracoes_item1: Need to prepare financial statements for audit
servicos_especiais.preparacao_demonstracoes_item2: Want to ensure total compliance with standards
servicos_especiais.preparacao_demonstracoes_item3: Want to speed up the audit process
servicos_especiais.preparacao_demonstracoes_item4: Seek to avoid unpleasant surprises during the audit
servicos_especiais.conciliacao_subtitulo: Absolute Precision for a Solid Balance Sheet
servicos_especiais.conciliacao_desc: We perform a deep and detailed analysis of your equity accounts. This reconciliation service identifies and points out inconsistencies, ensures the integrity of your assets and liabilities, and provides a 100% reliable database for management.
servicos_especiais.conciliacao_item1: Need precise reconciliation of equity accounts
servicos_especiais.conciliacao_item2: Want to identify and correct inconsistencies
servicos_especiais.conciliacao_item3: Want to ensure integrity of assets and liabilities
servicos_especiais.revisao_subtitulo: An Additional Level of Trust and Governance
servicos_especiais.revisao_desc: We offer a limited review service that provides a degree of security and validation for your financial statements. It is the ideal solution to meet demands from specific stakeholders or for management seeking an extra layer of governance, without the cost of a full audit.
servicos_especiais.revisao_item2: Want to meet demands from specific stakeholders
servicos_especiais.revisao_item3: Want an extra layer of governance
servicos_especiais.revisao_item4: Seek a more economical solution than a full audit
servicos_especiais.laudos_titulo: Accounting Reports for Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A)
servicos_especiais.laudos_subtitulo: The Clarity that Underpins Major Decisions
servicos_especiais.laudos_desc: In merger, acquisition or incorporation processes, precision is fundamental. Our specialists prepare technical and defensible accounting reports that serve as a pillar for company valuation and the due diligence process, ensuring security and clarity for high-value transactions.
servicos_especiais.laudos_item2: Need technical and defensible accounting reports
servicos_especiais.laudos_item4: Seek clarity for major strategic decisions
servicos_especiais.modelo_operacional_titulo: Let's Design the Ideal Operational Model for Your Business?
servicos_especiais.modelo_operacional_desc: Whatever your challenge - scaling operations, reducing costs, increasing governance or preparing for the future - we have the solution. Contact us and discover how BPO INNOVA can be the strategic partner your company needs.

solucoes_segmento.hero_sub: Transform bureaucratic complexity into a competitive advantage. Our specialized team offers customized solutions for each segment, from formation to sustainable growth of your company. With technical expertise and dedicated service, we guarantee total compliance and optimized processes, so you can focus on what really matters: making your business prosper.
solucoes_segmento.startups_subtitulo: From Idea to Investment Round: The Structure Your Startup Needs to Scale
solucoes_segmento.startups_desafio_texto: While you focus on product development and growth, basic accounting without precision, agility or technology becomes a significant risk, especially in attracting investors.
solucoes_segmento.startups_solucao_texto: We offer the robustness of a large company from day one, implementing consultative accounting with precise and real-time financial statements (IFRS/US GAAP), ready for any due diligence. Our scalable technology platform and service governance ensure that the back office grows with the client in an organized and professional manner.
solucoes_segmento.startups_item2: Need financial statements in international standards
solucoes_segmento.startups_item4: Want to focus on core business without worrying about back office
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_subtitulo: Premium Service with Global Standard: The Agility Your Brazil Operation Needs
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_desafio_texto: Operations in Brazil often face "headcount" limitations and the impersonality of large global providers, resulting in low quality and lack of flexibility. The complexity of the Brazilian tax system requires an agile local partner deeply knowledgeable about the country's particularities.
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_solucao_texto: We act as a strategic extension of the client's team, with a lean hierarchical structure that guarantees personalized and direct service from specialists. We offer a robust ERP for local operations and, as members of the GGI network, we guarantee perfect alignment with global practices, providing the best of both worlds: local expertise with international reach.
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_item1: Need personalized and agile service in Brazil
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_item2: Seek alignment with global practices and international standards
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_item3: Want local expertise to navigate Brazilian tax complexity
solucoes_segmento.multinacionais_item4: Desire flexibility and superior quality to global providers
solucoes_segmento.varejo_desafio_texto: The large volume of sales, the tax complexity of operations in multiple states and the need for integration between point-of-sale (POS) systems, marketplaces and ERP are constant challenges. Many accounting firms do not have the technology necessary to support this demand, generating errors, rework and high operational costs.
solucoes_segmento.varejo_solucao_texto: Our strength is in technology. Our ERP is designed to process large volumes of data with high performance and has superior integration capacity, automatically importing sales data. We eliminate the high cost of licenses and infrastructure, providing a complete solution that guarantees accuracy and total control over your operation.
solucoes_segmento.varejo_item1: Process high volume of daily transactions
solucoes_segmento.varejo_item2: Operate in multiple states with tax complexity
solucoes_segmento.varejo_item3: Need to integrate POS, marketplaces and ERP
solucoes_segmento.varejo_item4: Seek reduction of operational costs and errors
solucoes_segmento.servicos_subtitulo: Your Focus on the Client, Our Focus on Evidencing Your Results
solucoes_segmento.servicos_desafio_texto: Service companies prosper with talent, but face critical challenges in the back office: complex billing, tax calculations in different locations and difficulty measuring profitability. Precious time is consumed by these tasks instead of being dedicated to clients. Management is torn between maintaining a costly internal team or depending on traditional accounting, without agility and strategic vision to scale.
solucoes_segmento.servicos_solucao_texto: We are your strategic partner, solving these issues through integrated BPO (Accounting, Tax, Financial and Billing). We take on operational complexity with exclusive service governance methodology, implement cost centers for clear profitability per project and use cutting-edge technology to automate routines from issuance to reconciliation. Result: precise, efficient and scalable back office that acts as a pillar for growth, providing managers with the intelligence needed to focus on business expansion and customer satisfaction.
solucoes_segmento.servicos_item2: Operate in multiple locations with different tax regimes
solucoes_segmento.servicos_item3: Want to measure profitability per project or client
solucoes_segmento.servicos_item4: Seek to automate back office processes to focus on the client
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_subtitulo: Precision and Agility in Critical Moments
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_desafio_texto: In a Judicial Recovery or Bankruptcy process, time is crucial. The loss of access to systems, account blocking and pressure to generate accurate information for the Judicial Administrator and the judge require a partner that brings order to chaos, with maximum reliability and without delay.
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_solucao_texto: We act as the right arm of the Judicial Administrator and management. We immediately make available our technology platform and our specialized team to take on back office processes. We generate reports and statements with the agility and accuracy the moment requires, ensuring compliance with deadlines and providing the reliable information base for decision-making and the success of the recovery plan.
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_item1: Are in Judicial Recovery or Bankruptcy process
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_item2: Need accurate information for the Judicial Administrator
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_item3: Seek strict compliance with legal deadlines
solucoes_segmento.recuperacao_item4: Want specialized support in critical moments

inclusao.subtitulo: Diversity and Inclusion: Innovation through Differences
inclusao.intro: "BPO INNOVA believes that diversity drives innovation. Our Inclusion and Diversity Policy reflects our commitment to creating an environment where all talents are valued and have equitable opportunities for growth.
inclusao.conclusao: Because we believe that different perspectives generate more innovative solutions for our clients."

lavagem.titulo: Money Laundering Prevention and Combating Policy, Terrorism and Corruption
lavagem.intro: As a leading company in BackOffice outsourcing and technology solutions, BPO INNOVA recognizes its social and corporate responsibility in maintaining an ethical and transparent business environment.
lavagem.estrutura_intro: Our Money Laundering Prevention, Terrorism Financing and Corruption (PLD/FT/C) policy is based on:
lavagem.base_legal_texto: Full compliance with Laws 9.613/98, 12.683/12, Anti-Corruption Law (12.846/13) and COAF regulations
lavagem.gestao_texto: Identification, assessment and proactive mitigation of risks related to money laundering, terrorism and corruption
lavagem.cultura_texto: Promotion of ethical values at all organizational levels
lavagem.transparencia_texto: Regular reports and open communication with regulatory bodies
lavagem.compromisso_texto1: BPO INNOVA repudiates any act of money laundering, terrorism financing, or any criminal activities involving simulation or concealment of financial resources.
lavagem.compromisso_texto2: BPO INNOVA operates in compliance with legal requirements and standards established by the regulatory bodies of the auditor and accountant profession, and may be compelled to disclose information related to the contracting company's activities if it falls under Law No. 9.613/1998 (Money Laundering Law).
lavagem.compromisso_texto3: According to this Law, professionals and/or organizations that provide auditing and/or accounting services must inform the Financial Activities Control Council (COAF) about any suspected practice of activities covered by said Law, regardless of communication and/or authorization from the contracting party.
lavagem.conclusao: BPO INNOVA reaffirms its commitment to operate with maximum integrity, contributing to a safer and more reliable market for all stakeholders.

privacidade.intro: Your privacy is important to us. It is BPO INNOVA's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect on the BPO INNOVA website, and other sites we own and operate.
privacidade.coleta: We only request personal information when we really need it to provide you with a service. We do so by fair and legal means, with your knowledge and consent. We also inform you why we are collecting and how it will be used.
privacidade.armazenamento: We only retain the information collected for the time necessary to provide the requested service. When we store data, we protect it within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacidade.compartilhamento: We do not share personally identifiable information publicly or with third parties, except when required by law.
privacidade.links: Our website may have links to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot accept responsibility for their respective privacy policies.
privacidade.recusa: You are free to refuse our request for personal information, understanding that we may not be able to provide some of the desired services.
privacidade.aceitacao: Continued use of our website will be considered acceptance of our practices around Privacy Notice and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, please contact us.
privacidade.lgpd_texto: In case of questions or concerns related to our compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD) or privacy-related issues in general, please contact us at protecao.dados@bpoinnova-sp.com. We will be happy to clarify any doubts and provide additional information if necessary. Know that we take personal data protection very seriously and will do our best to meet your needs and ensure your satisfaction.
privacidade.cookies_oque_texto: As is common practice on almost all professional websites, this site uses cookies, which are small files downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they collect, how we use it, and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored, however, this may downgrade or 'break' certain elements of the site's functionality.
privacidade.cookies_como_texto: We use cookies for various reasons, detailed below. Unfortunately, in most cases, there are no standard industry options to disable cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not, in case they are used to provide a service you use.
privacidade.cookies_desativar_texto: You can prevent cookies from being set by adjusting your browser settings (see your browser's Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other sites you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in disabling certain features and functionality of this site. Therefore, it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.
privacidade.cookies_conta_texto: If you create an account with us, we will use cookies for the management of the registration process and general administration. These cookies will usually be deleted when you log out, however, in some cases, they may remain afterwards to remember your site preferences when you log out.
privacidade.cookies_login_texto: We use cookies when you are logged in, so we can remember this action. This prevents you from having to log in every time you visit a new page. These cookies are normally removed or cleared when you log out to ensure that you can only access restricted resources and areas when you log in.
privacidade.cookies_newsletter_texto: This site offers newsletter or email subscription services and cookies may be used to remember if you are already registered and whether to show certain notifications valid only for subscribed / unsubscribed users.
privacidade.cookies_pedidos_texto: This site offers e-commerce or payment facilities and some cookies are essential to ensure that your order is remembered between pages, so we can process it properly.
privacidade.cookies_pesquisas_texto: Periodically, we offer surveys and questionnaires to provide interesting information, useful tools, or to understand our user base more accurately. These surveys may use cookies to remember who has already participated in a survey or to provide accurate results after changing pages.
privacidade.cookies_formularios_texto: When you submit data through a form such as those found on contact pages or comment forms, cookies may be set to remember user details for future correspondence.
privacidade.cookies_preferencias_texto: To provide a great experience on this site, we provide functionality to set your preferences for how this site runs when you use it. To remember your preferences, we need to set cookies so that this information can be called whenever you interact with a page affected by your preferences.
privacidade.cookies_terceiros_intro: In some special cases, we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third-party cookies you may encounter through this site.
privacidade.cookies_analytics: • This site uses Google Analytics, which is one of the most widespread and reliable analytics solutions on the Web, to help us understand how you use the site and how we can improve your experience. These cookies can track items such as how long you spend on the site and pages visited, so we can continue to produce attractive content.
privacidade.cookies_analytics_info: For more information about Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.
privacidade.cookies_terceiros_analytics: • Third-party analytics are used to track and measure usage of this site, so we can continue to produce attractive content. These cookies can track items such as the time you spend on the site or pages visited, which helps us understand how we can improve the site for you.
privacidade.cookies_testes: • Periodically, we test new features and make subtle changes to how the site presents itself. When we are still testing new features, these cookies may be used to ensure you receive a consistent experience while on the site, while we understand which optimizations our users appreciate most.
privacidade.cookies_estatisticas: • As we sell products, it is important to understand statistics about how many visitors to our site actually purchase, and therefore this is the type of data these cookies will track. This is important to you because it means we can make accurate business predictions that allow us to analyze our advertising and product costs to ensure the best possible price.
privacidade.cookies_adsense: • The Google AdSense service we use to serve advertising uses a DoubleClick cookie to serve more relevant ads across the Web and limit the number of times a particular ad is shown to you.
privacidade.cookies_adsense_info: For more information about Google AdSense, see the official Google AdSense privacy FAQs.
privacidade.cookies_publicidade: • We use advertisements to offset the costs of running this site and provide funding for future developments. The behavioral advertising cookies used by this site are designed to ensure that you are provided with the most relevant advertisements whenever possible, anonymously tracking your interests and presenting similar things that may be of interest to you.
privacidade.cookies_afiliados: • Several partners advertise on our behalf and affiliate tracking cookies simply allow us to see if our customers have accessed the site through one of our partner sites, so we can credit them appropriately and, where applicable, allow our affiliate partners to offer any promotion that may provide you to make a purchase.
privacidade.compromisso_intro: The user undertakes to make proper use of the content and information that BPO INNOVA offers on the site and with an enunciative, but not limited, character:
privacidade.compromisso_a: A) Not to engage in activities that are illegal or contrary to good faith and public order;
privacidade.compromisso_b: B) Not to disseminate propaganda or content of a racist, xenophobic nature, any type of illegal pornography, apology for terrorism or against human rights;
privacidade.compromisso_c: C) Not to cause damage to the physical (hardware) and logical (software) systems of BPO INNOVA, its suppliers or third parties, to introduce or disseminate computer viruses or any other hardware or software systems that are capable of causing the aforementioned damage.
privacidade.mais_info_texto: We hope this is clear and, as mentioned earlier, if there is something you are not sure whether you need or not, it is usually safer to leave cookies enabled, in case you interact with one of the features you use on our site.

termos.termos_texto: By accessing the BPO INNOVA website, you agree to comply with these terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with all applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained on this site are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.
termos.licenca_intro: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on the BPO INNOVA website, for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
termos.licenca_item2: use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial);
termos.licenca_item3: attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the BPO INNOVA website;
termos.licenca_item4: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
termos.licenca_item5: transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.
termos.licenca_final: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by BPO INNOVA at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.
termos.isencao_texto1: The materials on the BPO INNOVA website are provided on an 'as is' basis. BPO INNOVA makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
termos.isencao_texto2: Further, BPO INNOVA does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
termos.limitacoes_texto: In no event shall BPO INNOVA or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on the BPO INNOVA website, even if BPO INNOVA or a BPO INNOVA authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.
termos.precisao_texto: The materials appearing on the BPO INNOVA website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. BPO INNOVA does not warrant that any material on its website is accurate, complete, or current. BPO INNOVA may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However, BPO INNOVA does not make any commitment to update the materials.
termos.links_texto: BPO INNOVA has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by BPO INNOVA of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
termos.modificacoes_texto: BPO INNOVA may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
termos.lei_texto: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of BPO INNOVA and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that state or location.
